document.full_text: the new york stock exchange is working with china to launch the country's international board that will allow foreign firms to list on the mainland, in a move seen as a crucial step in developing its capital markets.
document.title: nyse working with shanghai on international board
lines_and_colors: the new york stock exchange is working with china to launch the country's international board that will allow foreign firms to list on the mainland, in a move seen as a crucial step in developing its capital markets.
